response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, reflecting its unique features and craftsmanship. We believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations.

Considering its importance and the benefits it offers, we are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value and provides you with an unparalleled chance to own something truly remarkable.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that you will find this product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
